name: Weighted Momentum (21/21) OOS
description: Combines momentum indicators across multiple timeframes to enhance signal reliability.
author: StratCraft

parameters.name: initialCapital
parameters.label: Initial Capital
parameters.description: Initial capital in USD

parameters.name: tradeSizeRatio
parameters.label: Trade Size Ratio
parameters.description: Percentage of portfolio to use for each trade (e.g., 0.002 = 0.2%)

parameters.name: minimumTradeSize
parameters.label: Minimum Trade Size ($)
parameters.description: Minimum dollar value per trade. Orders smaller than this threshold are rounded up or skipped.

parameters.name: sellFraction
parameters.label: Sell Fraction
parameters.description: Fraction of the position to close when a sell signal is generated (0 = none, 1 = full position only)

parameters.name: allowShortSelling
parameters.label: Enable Short Selling
parameters.description: Set to 1 to allow strategies to enter short positions on sell signals (0 = disabled).

parameters.name: stopLossRatio
parameters.label: Stop Loss %
parameters.description: Stop loss percentage (e.g., 0.05 = 5%)

parameters.name: buyDiscountRatio
parameters.label: Buy Discount %
parameters.description: Buy only when price is below a certain discount from a baseline (e.g., 0.05 = 5% discount)

parameters.name: maxHoldingDays
parameters.label: Maximum Holding Days
parameters.description: Maximum number of days to hold a trade before forced closure

parameters.name: positionSizingMode
parameters.label: Position Sizing Mode
parameters.description: 0=fixed, 1=confidence, 2=volatility_target, 3=confidence_vol_target

parameters.name: volTargetAnnual
parameters.label: Target Annual Volatility
parameters.description: Annualized volatility target (e.g., 0.12 = 12%). 0 disables targeting.

parameters.name: volLookback
parameters.label: Volatility Lookback (days)
parameters.description: Lookback window for realized volatility estimate

parameters.name: stopLossMode
parameters.label: Stop Loss Mode
parameters.description: 0=percent, 1=atr

parameters.name: atrPeriod
parameters.label: ATR Period
parameters.description: ATR lookback period for ATR-based stops

parameters.name: atrMultiplier
parameters.label: ATR Multiplier
parameters.description: Multiplier for ATR-based stop distance

parameters.name: rocPeriod1
parameters.label: ROC Period 1
parameters.description: Period for the first Rate of Change calculation.

parameters.name: smaPeriod1
parameters.label: SMA Period 1
parameters.description: Smoothing period for the first ROC.

parameters.name: rocPeriod2
parameters.label: ROC Period 2
parameters.description: Period for the second Rate of Change calculation.

parameters.name: smaPeriod2
parameters.label: SMA Period 2
parameters.description: Smoothing period for the second ROC.

parameters.name: weight1
parameters.label: Weight 1
parameters.description: Weight for the first smoothed ROC.

parameters.name: weight2
parameters.label: Weight 2
parameters.description: Weight for the second smoothed ROC.

parameters.name: minConfidence
parameters.label: Minimum Confidence
parameters.description: Minimum confidence level to execute trades (0-1)

exampleUsage: Use 21/21 periods for ROC and SMA as a starting point.
